description: "Aggron" is a conjunction of aggressive or "aggro", because it has an aggressive nature, and iron, because its whole body is plated with iron. However, the name may also come from "aggregate", a term used to refer to rock and gravel. Its Japanese name contains ボス bosu, the transliteration of boss. ゴドラ Godora is a variation of Kodora, making it the "boss of Kodora" or the "Boss Kodora." It also resembles the name Gojira.
name: Bossgodora
